item.title: Drone Racing Optimisation
item.description:
Team Drone-Acharya in the Finals!!!

Worked as a part of Drone-Acharya Team, IIT Kharagpur for the Flipkart GRID-2.0 Robotics Track Competition: Autonomous Indoor Drone. Working on an Imitation-Learning based learning algorithm for fast Quadrotor trajectory planning using DAGGER. Fully deployed an expert minimum-snap trajectory generation algorithm on Microsoft AirSim Simulator on a custom warehouse environment built on Unreal Engine. More details coming soon!

item.title: Hateful Memes Detection
item.description:
Performed Pretraining and Finetuning of cutting-edge Multimodal Attention-based models like Visual-BERT and Concat-BERT. Experimented with different dataset augmentations and training techniques like negative supervision. Paper coming soon!!

Currently ranked 18th in the leaderboard for the Hatememe detection Challenge, NIPS.

item.title: Warehouse management using Quadrotors
item.description: Developed a algorithm for autonomous warehouse inventory management using UAVs for the 11th International Micro Aerial Vehicles competition and conference(IMAV-2019). Devised a traversal algorithm using coloured frames for localisation, for performing the complete inventory in minimum time on a DJI-Tello microdrone. Developed the OCR tools for accurate detection of alphanumeric codes using googleâ€™s Tesseract library and QR-codes using Zbar library for inventory management of boxes in a warehouse. Won the IMAV-2019 Indoor Competition! :)
